name: Avoid classes with excessive number of weighted methods (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the classes with excessive number of weighted methods. Threshold for weighted methods is set to 50. Weight of a method is it's cyclomatic complexity.
output:
This report lists all the classes with excessive number of weighted methods.

This QR provides the following information:
Class  full name.
rationale:
The number of weighted methods in a class is a good indicator of how much time and effort is required to modify and maintain this class. A class with a large number of weighted methods also means that this class has a greater potential impact on derived classes and therefore the cost to maintain and test it is also high.

Large number of weighted methods also means that this class has a greater potential impact on derived classes.


A class with more than 50 weighted methods is considered violation for this QR.
remediation: Modify the source code of the class to reduce the number of weighted methods.
